entry.title: 我的第一篇文章
entry.content: 我的第一篇文章我的二篇文章我的第九页也问他还在那 我的梦的是显示打法飞机安防监控链接发卡付款jafkjsklfkadf fkadjksfjkdjkjasdjflkjkdjskfkaj 我的梦去开发 的空气 北京的天气十分讨厌 北京欢迎你 雨果的作家adskfkajfslkjklaj海因执行地球 亚洲 中国 广东 广州梅州深圳广州 广州|每周|深圳 :—–|—–:|:–: 1|2|3 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118package com.gzjiequan.rescuewithyou.rescuespot.video;import android.os.Bundle;import android.view.SurfaceView;import android.view.View;import android.widget.Button;import android.widget.LinearLayout;import com.gzjiequan.rescuewithyou.R;import com.gzjiequan.rescuewithyou.base.App;import com.gzjiequan.rescuewithyou.base.BaseActivity;import com.gzjiequan.rescuewithyou.util.LogUtil;import com.gzjiequan.rescuewithyou.util.ToastUtil;import butterknife.BindView;import butterknife.ButterKnife;import io.agora.rtc.Constants;import io.agora.rtc.IRtcEngineEventHandler;import io.agora.rtc.RtcEngine;import io.agora.rtc.video.VideoCanvas;public class SpotVideoActivity extends BaseActivity { @BindView(R.id.btFinish) Button btFinish; @BindView(R.id.btJoin) Button btJoin; @BindView(R.id.llVideoLoc) LinearLayout llVideoLoc; @BindView(R.id.llVideoRemote) LinearLayout llVideoRemote; private RtcEngine rtcEngine; @Override protected int getContentViewId() { return R.layout.activity_spot_video; } @Override protected void initView(Bundle savedInstanceState) { if (rtcEngine != null) { return; } try { rtcEngine = RtcEngine.create(App.getInstance().getApplicationContext(), "f88d96cb86394031b7698883369b1b3c", new IRtcEngineEventHandler() { @Override public void onJoinChannelSuccess(String channel, int uid, int elapsed) { super.onJoinChannelSuccess("onJoinChannelSuccess", uid, elapsed); LogUtil.d(TAG, channel + " uid:" + uid); } @Override public void onFirstRemoteVideoDecoded(int uid, int width, int height, int elapsed) { ToastUtil.showMessage("onFirstRemoteVideoDecoded" + " uid:" + uid); } }); //打开视频模式 rtcEngine.enableVideo(); rtcEngine.disableAudio(); rtcEngine.setVideoProfile(Constants.VIDEO_PROFILE_360P, false); rtcEngine.joinChannel(null, "beijing", null, 1); SurfaceView asvVideoLoc = rtcEngine.CreateRendererView(App.getInstance().getApplicationContext()); rtcEngine.setupLocalVideo(new VideoCanvas(asvVideoLoc, VideoCanvas.RENDER_MODE_HIDDEN, 1)); llVideoLoc.addView(asvVideoLoc); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } btFinish.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() { @Override public void onClick(View v) { if (rtcEngine != null) { rtcEngine.leaveChannel(); finish(); } } }); btJoin.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() { @Override public void onClick(View v) { SurfaceView asvVideoRemote = rtcEngine.CreateRendererView(App.getInstance().getApplicationContext()); rtcEngine.setupRemoteVideo(new VideoCanvas(asvVideoRemote, VideoCanvas.RENDER_MODE_HIDDEN, 2)); llVideoRemote.addView(asvVideoRemote); } }); } @Override protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) { super.onCreate(savedInstanceState); // TODO: add setContentView(...) invocation ButterKnife.bind(this); } @Override protected void onDestroy() { if (rtcEngine != null) { rtcEngine.leaveChannel(); } super.onDestroy(); } @Override public void onBackPressed() { if (rtcEngine != null) { rtcEngine.leaveChannel(); } super.onBackPressed(); }}

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
